resources.string: View and Search all destinations, activities, attractions, restaurants, and tour guides.
Lets you know of establishments, attractions or events near where you are
Manage your travel easy and safe

Taytay, Rizal is known as the Garments Capital of the Philippines and is home to the increasingly popular Taytay Tiangge. Thanks to an initiative by the local Taytay government in 2014, Taytay-based dressmakers who used to rent space in Baclaran, Divisoria, and Greenhills now have a more conducive business location right in their backyard. Since then, the Taytay Tiangge has become a shopperâ€™s paradise and a godsend for wholesalers.
This app allows you to view and search all destinations, attractions, restaurants, and tour guides
See the beauty of Taytay Rizal
